Detailed Description

This class is a factory for VLO items, used by the actual VLO (not the references).

e.g. ChunkWater

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef bool(*) VLOFactory::Creator(Chunk *pChunk, DataSectionPtr pSection, std::string uid)

VLOFactory::VLOFactory ( const std::string &  section,
int  priority = 0,
Creator  creator = NULL 
)

Constructor.

Registers with chunk's static factory registry

Parameters:
section Section name associated with this factory.
priority Priority this factory has in relation to given name.
creator Creation callback.

Member Function Documentation

bool VLOFactory::create ( Chunk *  pChunk,
DataSectionPtr  pSection,
std::string  uid 
) const [virtual]

This virtual method calls the creator function that was passed in, as long as it's not NULL.

It is called by a Chunk when it encounters the section name.

Parameters:
pChunk Chunk to be created in.
pSection Source data section.
uid Unique identifier for the VLO.
Returns:
true if succeeded
